newsitem.title: USA: RAC Financial proposes two mln shr offer.
newsitem.headline: RAC Financial proposes two mln shr offer.

text.p: RAC Financial Group Inc said Friday that it will make a registered underwritten public offering of about two million pre-split common shares.
Last month RAC approved a 2-for-1 common stock split, payable November 29 for shareholders of record November 15.
RAC said it will file the registration for the offering in December and make the offer in January or February 1997.
In addition to two million shares offered by the company, there will be 400,000 secondary shares offered by certain non-management shareholders.
RAC said none of its senior officers plan to sell shares.
